query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:CODE:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:ROLLOVER_INTERVAL:ROLLOVER_INTERVAL@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:FROM_DATE:FROM_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:SLICE_PERIOD:SLICE_PERIOD@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:NUMBER_OF_PERIODS:NUMBER_OF_PERIODS@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:ITEM:ITEM@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:EXPIRATION:EXPIRATION@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:DATA_WAREHOUSE:DATA_WAREHOUSE@ FROM ( SELECT pbsr.request_name AS code , f.name AS rollover_interval , pbsr.from_date AS from_date , p.name AS slice_period , pbsr.num_periods AS number_of_periods , i.name AS item , pbsr.expiration_date AS expiration , pbsr.is_dwh_request AS data_warehouse FROM prj_blb_slicerequests pbsr LEFT JOIN cmn_lookups_v p ON p.lookup_enum = pbsr.period AND p.lookup_type = 'BLB_SLICE_PERIOD' AND p.language_code = 'en' LEFT JOIN cmn_lookups_v f ON f.lookup_enum = pbsr.frequency AND f.lookup_type = 'BLB_SLICE_PERIOD' AND f.language_code = 'en' LEFT JOIN cmn_lookups_v i ON i.lookup_enum = pbsr.field AND i.lookup_type = 'BLB_SLICE_ITEM' AND i.language_code = 'en' WHERE pbsr.is_visible = 1 AND pbsr.is_template = 0 AND pbsr.is_synchronous = 0 ) x WHERE @FILTER@
